Mad quiz fing_x

Don't read ahead...just do it in order! It takes about three minutes...it's worth a try

First..get a pen and paper. When you actually choose names, make sure it's people you actually know and go with your first instinct.

Scroll down one line at a time...and don't read ahead or you'll ruin it!

1. First, write the numbers 1 through 11 in a column.

2. Then, beside numbers 1 and 2, write down any two numbers you want.

3. Beside the 3 and 7, write down the names of members of the opposite sex.

NO LOOKING AHEAD...OR IT WON"T TURN OUT RIGHT!

4. Write anyone's name (like friends or family....) in the 4th, 5th,

and 6th spots.

5. Write down four song titles in 8,9,10, and 11.

GO WITH YOUR INSTINCT PEOPLE!!!!

6. Finally, make a wish.

And now the key for the game.....

1. You must tell (the number in space 2) people about this game.

2. The person in space 3 is the one that you love.

3. The person in 7 is one you like but can't work out.

4. You care most about the person you put in 4

5. The person you name in number 5 is the one who knows you very well.

6. The person you name in 6 is your lucky star.

7. The song in 8 is the song that matches with the person in number 3.

8. The title in 9 is the song for the person in 7.

9. The tenth space is the song that tells you most about YOUR mind.

10. and 11 is the song telling you how you feel about life

NOW...put this on ur syt within the hour you read this...IF you do..your wish will come true. If you don't it will become the opposite!!

My dayyyyyyy....

Well I'm bored so thought I'd tell yhuu all about ma day Got up at 8:45,woken by ma mum..so so tired lol..but had to get up docs appointment..Went downstairs had a cigarette,thn back upstairs to do ma makeup..cudnt reallii be arsed so onlii put a bit on lol..Threw on jeans as usual haha thn headed to docs in ma dads car.Docs a divvy..won't gimmee nemore sleepin pills gave me ma citalapram tho..beta than nothin n started freezin the warts off ma toe for tha 2nd time.I thort lykk once ya had been once the warts wer gone,but oh no takes bout 12 wks apparantly :S Now am just sat at home chillin NEED A JOB lol so bored..think I'll have a few snowballs n read a good book! Neways adios 4 now peeps xxxxxxx

weeellllll......

we were best mates and for ages then she said it was all fake she just wanted to get her revenge on me because when i was younger and drank all the time i hit her really hardn bruised her really bad n we fell out for ages but then we made up and it was a normal best friend relationship and i fort everything was great i loved her so much she was there when i found out i was pregnant she seen my scans she was gonna be my babys godmutha and everthing then josy come to live here with me n tif didnt like it and she was saying im a mug n all this then her and josy became best mates and i never seen them then josy moved back to london and we sorted what the problem was then me n tif made up and i tried to be back the same i rang her all the time but she was never in and she never rang me bk but dosy me still tried and never realised she didnt want to no then she was ont he comp one night talkin bout normal stuff n she said thats she was only PRETENDING to be my friend so she could get her "revenge" on me and that all this time thats what she was doing

so thats good old tif

*Poem*

The spirit in my dreams

A flicker of a candle,

A movement of a door,

A footstep on the stairs,

A picture falling from the wall,

A light switching off,

A silent phone call,

A distant yet loud whisper,

A shadow in the corner of a room.

I think I know know who this is,

I can smell thier scent from here,

But I can't actually see them,

So what am I supposed to believe?

I feel kind of scared,

But I also feel at ease,

Just give me a more clear sign,

Of who is contacting me.

A quiver of a bush,

A sudden,frantic storm,

A feeling of eyes upon me,

A strange feelin of calm,

A round and shining moon,

A noise of blowing leaves,

A clock striking twelve more than once,

A Weird feeling of fear.

Is this who I think it is?

Or have I got it wrong?

I'm feeling really nervous now,

Please just give me a clue,

I really need to know,

And I think I am right,

After all everything I dream,

Always seems to be right..
